Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Axe = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myRightArm local myHumanoid
local characterMass
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local jumpBV
local damage = 20
local animating
Tool.Enabled = true
local dashTime = 0 local lastKeyDown = 0 local runService = game:service("RunService")
local attackType
local newBV
local storeWeld = Tool:FindFirstChild("FireWeld") while storeWeld == nil do storeWeld = Tool:FindFirstChild("FireWeld") wait() end
function computeWeight(object) local totalMass = 0 local ch if object == nil then return end if type(object) == "table" then ch = object else ch = object:GetChildren() end for i = 1, #ch do if ch[i]:IsA("BasePart") then totalMass = totalMass + ch[i]:GetMass() end totalMass = totalMass + computeWeight(ch[i]) end return totalMass end
function slashIt(hum, torso) damage = 30 local target = hum.TargetPoint local direction = (target - torso.Position) * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) newBV = nil if direction.magnitude > .01 then direction = direction.unit newBV = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") newBV.P = 100000 newBV.maxForce = Vector3.new(newBV.P, 0, newBV.P) newBV.velocity = direction * 50 newBV.Parent = torso torso.CFrame = CFrame.new(torso.Position, target * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1) + Vector3.new(0, torso.Position.Y, 0)) end wait(.5) if newBV ~= nil then newBV:remove() end Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) damage = 20 wait(.5) end
function checkForLunge(key) attackType = Tool:FindFirstChild("AttackType") if key:lower() == "w" then t = runService.Stepped:wait() if (t - lastKeyDown < 0.2) then dashTime = t end lastKeyDown = t elseif key:lower() == "q" then if attackType then attackType.Value = 2 end elseif key:lower() == "e" then if attackType then attackType.Value = 1 end end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1.5) end end
function blow(hit) if hit and hit.Parent then humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if humanoid and myHumanoid and myHumanoid ~= humanoid then local rightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if rightArm then local rightGrip = rightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if rightGrip and (rightGrip.Part0 == Axe or rightGrip.Part1 == Axe) then tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) end end end end end
function destroyEverything() attackType = Tool:FindFirstChild("AttackType") drill = Tool:FindFirstChild("Drill") wave = Tool:FindFirstChild("Wave") if attackType then if attackType.Value == 2 and wave and wave.Value == 0 then wave.Value = 1 wait(10.0) elseif attackType.Value == 1 and drill and drill.Value == 0 then drill.Value = 1 wait(5.0) end end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myRightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myTorso == nil or myRightArm == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
print(attackType)
t = runService.Stepped:wait() if t - dashTime < 0.2 then slashIt(myHumanoid, myTorso) wait(0.5) animating = false else destroyEverything() wait(0.6) animating = false end
wait(2.0)
Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped(mouse) vCharacter = Tool.Parent characterMass = computeWeight(vCharacter) if mouse then mouse.KeyDown:connect(checkForLunge) end local checkWeld = Tool:FindFirstChild("FireWeld") if checkWeld == nil then checkWeld = storeWeld:Clone() checkWeld.Parent = Tool end end
function onUnequipped() if jumpBV then jumpBV:Remove() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
Axe.Touched:connect(blow)

local Tool = script.Parent local Axe = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myHumanoid local myTorso
local wave = Tool:FindFirstChild("Wave") local drill = Tool:FindFirstChild("Drill")
function computeWeight(object) local totalMass = 0 local ch if object == nil then return end if type(object) == "table" then ch = object else ch = object:GetChildren() end for i = 1, #ch do if ch[i]:IsA("BasePart") then totalMass = totalMass + ch[i]:GetMass() end totalMass = totalMass + computeWeight(ch[i]) end return totalMass end
while wave == nil or drill == nil do wave = Tool:FindFirstChild("Wave") drill = Tool:FindFirstChild("Drill") wait() end
wave.Changed:connect(function() wave = Tool:FindFirstChild("Wave") if wave and wave.Value == 1 and myTorso and myHumanoid then local theta if myHumanoid and myTorso then myHumanoid.Jumping:connect(function() if myTorso:FindFirstChild("jumpBV") == nil then jumpBV = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") jumpBV.P = 50000 jumpBV.maxForce = Vector3.new(0, jumpBV.P, 0) jumpBV.Name = "jumpBV" jumpBV.velocity = Vector3.new(0, characterMass/4.0, 0) jumpBV.Parent = myTorso end end) end for i = 1, 300 do theta = i%6 * math.pi/3 Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0, math.cos(theta), math.sin(theta)) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, -math.sin(theta), math.cos(theta)) wait() end
if jumpBV then jumpBV:Remove() end
Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) wave.Value = 0 end end)
drill.Changed:connect(function() drill = Tool:FindFirstChild("Drill") if drill and drill.Value == 1 then local theta Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) for i = 1, 150 do theta = i%6 * math.pi/3 Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(math.cos(theta), math.sin(theta), 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(math.sin(theta), -math.cos(theta), 0) wait() end
Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) drill.Value = 0 end end)
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") characterMass = computeWeight(vCharacter) end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped)
